name: part_011
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Indonesian voiceover explains the rules and guidelines for Hololive Super Expo 2022 and hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish.
Transition to the event introduction with a Japanese voiceover.

subtitles.original: Kami mohon juga untuk tidak mengeluarkan suara pada saat konser
subtitles.english: We also ask you to refrain from making noise during the concert
to prevent the spread of the coronavirus.

subtitles.original: Mohon dukung kami dengan tepukan tangan dan juga penlight ya!
subtitles.english: Please support us with applause and penlights!

subtitles.original: Selanjutnya adalah pengumuman untuk para pendatang yang menonton livestream.
subtitles.english: Next is an announcement for viewers watching the livestream.
You are prohibited from recording, broadcasting,

subtitles.original: atau meng-upload ulang stream konser secara ilegal.
subtitles.english: or re-uploading the concert stream illegally.

subtitles.original: Tetapi sebagai gantinya, anda dianjurkan untuk upload screenshot
subtitles.english: But in exchange, you are encouraged to upload screenshots

subtitles.original: dan posting mengenai konser kami di media sosial!
subtitles.english: and post about our concert on social media!

subtitles.original: Mari gunakan tagar #つながるホロライブDAY1
subtitles.english: Let's use the hashtag #つながるホロライブDAY1

subtitles.original: di media sosial saat posting kesanmu mengenai acara ini.
subtitles.english: on social media when posting your impressions of this event.

subtitles.original: Karena konser live ini akan menggunakan data berukuran besar,
subtitles.english: Because this live concert will use a large amount of data,

subtitles.original: kami menyarankan penggunaan Wi-Fi jika anda menonton dari smartphone.
subtitles.english: we recommend using Wi-Fi if you are watching from a smartphone.

subtitles.original: Jika kualitas koneksi internet anda tidak memadai, kami tidak bisa menjamin kualitas video.
subtitles.english: If your internet connection quality is inadequate, we cannot guarantee video quality.

subtitles.original: Kami berkomitmen untuk mempersiapkan livestream ini dengan sebaik mungkin.
subtitles.english: We are committed to preparing this livestream as well as possible.

subtitles.original: Namun karena ini merupakan acara yang tayang secara langsung,
subtitles.english: However, as this is a live broadcast,

subtitles.original: tetap ada kemungkinan terjadinya masalah teknis. Kami mohon pengertiannya ya.
subtitles.english: there is still the possibility of technical issues. We ask for your understanding.

subtitles.original: 本日は、ホロライブ3rdフェス、Link Your Wish...
subtitles.english: Today is hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish...
